## Media

I provide media comment on research and stories relating to conspiracy theories. Selected media engagements include [newspaper](https://www.theguardian.com/science/2022/apr/19/in-a-pandemic-of-medical-misinformation-how-do-you-deal-with-conspiracy-believers), [podcasts](https://www.abc.net.au/radionational/programs/rearvision/medical-conspiracy-theories-through-the-ages/13649988), [television appearances](https://www.abc.net.au/news/2021-06-15/why-do-people-buy-into-conspiracy-theories-like-qanon/13388796), and [radio](https://www.abc.net.au/triplej/programs/hack/hack/13535808).

My colleagues and I have also written for [The Conversation](https://theconversation.com/was-phar-lap-killed-by-gangsters-new-research-shows-which-conspiracies-people-believe-in-and-why-158610).
